title: Recruiting BRONZE MID LANER!!!
body:
Yo so we need a Bronze mid laner for our team... We have one already but hes not the best and we are looking for someone a little bit better..
Can be anywhere in bronze 

____ 
  But preferably higher bronze 1-2 but we will take anyone that is good and knows good mechanics :)
___
Reply back on this if you're interested 

Cheers

EDIT!!!
Must be able to play on saturday and friday nights mostly!! about 5pm EST Sorry for late notice

replies.body: Jason are you looking to join a silver team? Add me ingame

I'm on 4 teams at the moment and still trying to do enough solo ranked to climb the ladder so i probably wouldn't join another team :P

This was just me being a smartass.
I'm interested, usually a jungle main but do play a lot of Mid when I can. Main champs are Leblanc, Ahri, Zed, Lissandra and Jayce.
does it have to be bronze i want to join a team and I'm happy to do mid but I'm s2, s1 in a few wins???

> [{quoted}](name=ImDuhN00B,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=udAaO5tv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-08T07:21:23.891+0000)
>
> does it have to be bronze i want to join a team and I'm happy to do mid but I'm s2, s1 in a few wins???

Pretty sure he will let since you are higher than bronze.

Man of course not :) We just needed someone, and I was trying to offer to bronze players because anything higher and we would probs be seen as noobs compared to someone higher :) 
But man we will be happy to Take you on send me a friend request and ill add you to the team

plus if you add someone higher

u will be playing higher elos too
soo ill happily join only catch im gold 3 :/ main adc and mid ill happily fill roster if you need i dont mind add me in game if your interested

add me in.

I like mid.
I'm bronze 3 I was bronze 1 but as you know bronze life is terrorble and I got out with some horrorble teams I will be your kid laner tho :3

Seems like your on a bit of a losing streak ahha!
I'll get back to you :)
Defenatly not a losing streak as I only recently did my provisionals and I will get beyond bronze as I was plat 2 last season but if you want some bjergsen Ahri and syndra plays then I'm your player
